Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Attributes to Support Rapid Repositioning Strategies
Less than 50% of Replacement Cost in Strong, Competitive, Central Location
Ideal Demographic Profile for Medical Office, with Dense, Older, Affluent Neighborhoods
Resilient Submarket & MSA Fundamentals with Strengthening Trends

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Built in 1986, One Medical Park MOB has always served as the primary medical office property between the Quarry/Airport area and Stone Oak/Loop 1604.  One Medical Park remains the only MOB over 30,000 SF and only multi-story MOB along this 7-mile stretch of San Antonioâ€™s major north-south highway.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Value-Add MOB: Strong submarket with minimal competition and simple strategies to execute a rapid repositioning.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Fixed-rate assumable debt just funded September 2020
Positively positioned for both up and down economic cycles and tenant size adjustments

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 575,737 SF over 11 buildings; 34.57-Acre Office Park | 81% Occupancy

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: With Fortune 500 company neighbors and close proximity to the South Texas Medical Center, La Cantera and The Rim, this building is ideally located.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Located in University Business Park, this building is situated less than 1/2 mile from the amenities of IH-10 and in a bustling corporate campus setting. A new roof was installed in 2012 and the HVAC was replaced in 2019.  

Additionally, new interior improvements by the tenant include a gym and open office areas with exposed ducting. The building is currently used as headquarters location with office and light fabrication capabilities. Large floor plates provide flexibility if a multi-tenant option is desired.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 41,572 SF Office Park for Sale in Northwest San Antonio
